titleInfo.title: A relativistic extension of event-enhanced quantum theory

mods.abstract: A relativistic extension of Event-Enhanced Quantum Theory (EEQT) is developed and applied to compute time-of-arrival, traversal time, and tunneling time.

subject.topic: Relativistische Quantentheorie , , Event-enhanced quantum theory , Relativistic quantum theory , Time of arrival , Tunneling time
